若启用，您的载具部件将自动在几秒钟内同步给其他玩家。
ui.options.multiplayer.queueSpawnEdit.to: If enabled, remote vehicle spawns and edits will be put in a queue, instead of applying instantly
ui.options.multiplayer.queueAuto.tooltip: If enabled, you will only spawn queued vehicles once you come to a stop
ui.options.multiplayer.queueApplySpeed.t: Your vehicle has to be moving slower than this speed for queues to apply
ui.options.multiplayer.queueApplyTimeout: You have to move under your set speed threshold for this long before queues apply
ui.options.multiplayer.queueAutoSkipRemo: 若启用，您将在旁观其他玩家时即刻生成队列中的载具
ui.options.multiplayer.queueSkipUnicycle: 若启用，您将即刻生成其他玩家的模型。
若启用，将限制其他载具的运算量。
ui.options.multiplayer.nameTagShowDistan: 显示与其他玩家的距离
ui.options.multiplayer.debugOutput: 在终端内显示网络状态
ui.options.multiplayer.launcherPort: 启动器端口：[br]若非必要，请勿更改。
ui.options.multiplayer.launcherPort.tool: 将此设置为启动器所使用的端口。
ui.options.multiplayer.clearLauncherCach: Enabling this will clear the currently download mod cache of the launcher. Doing this will result in you having to download all mods for each server you join again.
ui.options.multiplayer.skipOtherPlayersV: 禁止切换至其他玩家的载具
ui.options.multiplayer.fadeVehicles: Fade out vehicles as they get closer
ui.options.multiplayer.fadeVehicles.tool: Good when paired with disabled collisions
ui.options.multiplayer.disableLuaReload: Disable Lua reloading when quitting a multiplayer server.
Lua reloads are required to ensure that the game is put back to a working state if mods had replaced game functions. Can be disabled for a smoother experience at your own risk.
ui.options.multiplayer.disableInstabilit: 禁止因不稳定所导致的暂停
这会让游玩更流畅，但可能会在几次不稳定后出现同步问题。
ui.options.multiplayer.simplifyRemoteVeh: This setting will replace remote vehicles with the BeamNG provided 'traffic' versions. Reduces accuracy of collisions and visuals, but improves performance
ui.options.multiplayer.enableBlobs.toolt: Unspawned vehicles will appear as blobs
ui.options.multiplayer.showSpectators: 在载具名牌下显示旁观玩家
ui.options.multiplayer.showSpectators.to: Players spectating others' vehicles will be listed under their nametags
ui.options.multiplayer.spectatorUnifiedC: 将所有旁观玩家以灰色显示，无论其身份
ui.options.multiplayer.nametagFadeDistan: How far nametags will start fading in/stop fading out
Maximum number of characters you want to see in a name
ui.options.multiplayer.shortenNametags.t: 缩短过长的玩家名和身份
ui.multiplayer.notFullTooltip: 仅显示有空位的服务器
ui.multiplayerlauncher.lost: 游戏未链接至启动器，请使用启动器打开游戏。
ui.multiplayertos.title: Rules and terms of service
ui.multiplayertos.tos.description1: Full terms of services can be found
ui.multiplayertos.tos.description2: In order to play BeamMP you will have to read and accept the terms of service.
ui.multiplayertos.rules.description1: 我们的规则可以在此找到
ui.multiplayertos.rules.description2: In order to play BeamMP you will have to accept all the game only rules.
ui.multiplayertos.info1: For more information, be sure to check our
ui.multiplayertos.info2: You can also find more information on our
